title: Perma ban(s)
body:
In the 6 years, I have been playing the league at the beginning for fun now a bit more competitive Ive lost 2 accounts already. The issue is people not taking the ranked game seriously. How many times have we had players trolling around and feeding like hell and in the end, you are the one being banned for saying '' you are being reported'' the chat system does not work. I haven't used any bad language or anything against them but seems like the system only targets the one moment where you will lose your cool instead of overall accomplishments. I get honours every game and I never give up I always assist my teammates and enemies, in the end, giving feedback on how to improve so the league becomes a more enjoyable place.
Riot has done messed up the whole system and bans only when you've said something to them but no when they ruin the whole game.
I 've got recordings of players abusing everyone feeding everyone, talking very badly to enemies and teammates and all they get is an S grade nothing else.
So in conclusion, FUCK YOU RIOT. IVE DONT WASTING ALL THIS TIME IN THIS BULLSHIT GAME TO GET BANNED IN THE END. THE ISSUE IS THAT A FREAKING PROGRAMM DECIDES WHAT HAPPENS NOT A FREAKING NERD BEHIND A COMPUTER. ALL PERMA BANS SHOULD BE ANALYSED AND DISCUSSES WITH A SUMMONER. AGAIN FUCK YOU RIOT AND YOUR SHITTY BROKEN SYSTEM.

I am so pissed at the moment. I do not care it is too late anyway. But it's unfair to all of us which are trying to enjoy the game. I have never heard of a ban on intentionally feeding or griefing in 6 years I play the league, and I am not talking about a bad game, I am talking about continuous trolling toxic people ruining every game. :)

Does no one else see all the bots? These auto 14 day bans got people buying bot accounts like crazy. Bring back tribunal that system was way more fair/in-depth punishment, not just a player having a bad game getting flamed by a duo and getting auto 14 day ban for saying two curse words in retaliation. If anyone says just mute or don’t be toxic, you trying playing a ranked game with “soMEone” after you tilted him by saying/doing something not smart the system will only ban for chat related aggression not “soMeone” passive-aggressively inting as to not be obvious and not defending; believe me, you will utter those two words and I hope you get the 14 day so you see how unreasonable it is. -Not a rant, just an opinion.

The Tribunal was shelved because it couldn't even begin to keep up with the incoming reports and it resulted in about the same accuracy, if not worse, than the automatic system.

People active in the Tribunal were just as often to ignore who started it first as much as it does now. And just as likely to ere on the side of caution when punishing people for intentionally feeding when they're not confident on the judgement.

Hmm I think I do remember it not keeping up, but I believe that was due to players not participating in the tribunal because the incentive wasn’t there for people to spend their time going through reports. But trust me this system doesn’t work at all. This community has become so soft, I’ve been off and on league since season 3 (just came back a few months ago) missed probably seasons 5-8, never even been chat restricted, but this season alone I’ve lost 3 accounts. I don’t really care about the loss of accounts I just dislike the entire community now bunch of reporting crybabies; I mute everyone and everything every game now.

Nothing really works, everyone tilts but the system does not pick how frequently someone spams, is toxic, it does not recognize a pattern to see how toxic someone. As a billion dollar company should aim at minimizing the unfair bans and looking at how to make the game better, but they've got their attention on stupid games resulting in profits.
If players read the TOS more often and learned what not to do in games, then there would be less bans and complaints on these boards. It's not the system. It's the player.
